text: Ngakho-ke waqala (ngokusesha) imithwalo yabo ngaphambi kokuba (aseshe) umthwalo womfowabo wayesesikhipha (isitsha senkosi) emthwalweni kamfowabo samenzela kanjalo icebo uJosefa, wayengeke amthathe umfowabo ngokwenkolo (ngokomthetho) wenkosi ngaphandle uma uMvelinqangi ethanda, siyawenyusa amazinga kulowo esimthandayo nangaphezulu kwabo bonke abanolwazi (kepha uMvelinqangi) unolwazi
